title: Kraftwerk's Electronic Classic 'Pocket Calculator' Gets Remastered
summary: Kraftwerk's 1981 song 'Pocket Calculator' received a digital remaster in 2009
content:
• Originally released in 1981 on Computer World album
• Features lyrics about being an operator with a calculator
• Blends electronic music with robotic vocals
• Known for minimalist electronic composition style
• 2009 remaster enhanced audio quality
• Song length is 4 minutes 57 seconds
